item.title: [PI] Sir Vant stances [PI]
item.dc:creator: @gizmo301 gizmo301
item.description:
@gizmo301 wrote:

As you can see in the picture, doing ::pnpc doesn’t give me the same stance as Sir Vant, does anyone know the stances? Here’s some code of how I did it for santa.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("santa")) { if (c.playerStandIndex != 11046) { c.npcId2 = 8540; c.isNpc = true; c.playerStandIndex = 11046; c.playerTurnIndex = 11047; c.playerWalkIndex = 11047; c.playerTurn180Index = 11047; c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 11046; c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 11046; c.playerRunIndex = 11047; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.getPA().requestUpdates(); c.playerLevel[3] = 99999999; c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.gfx0(2003); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); c.playerLevel[5] = 99999999; c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); c.playerLevel[0] = 99999999; c.getPA().refreshSkill(0); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); c.playerLevel[2] = 99999999; c.getPA().refreshSkill(2); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); c.playerLevel[1] = 99999999; c.getPA().refreshSkill(1); c.sendMessage("SantaMode has been activated."); } else { c.isNpc = false; c.playerStandIndex = 0x328; c.playerTurnIndex = 0x337; c.playerWalkIndex = 0x333; c.playerTurn180Index = 0x334; c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 0x335; c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 0x336; c.playerRunIndex = 0x338; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("SantaMode has been deactivated."); } }

Read full topic
